perturbation.original_text: Either Party may terminate this Agreement at any time prior to delivery of the Product.
perturbation.changed_text: Either Party may terminate this Agreement only with mutual written consent, prior to delivery of the Product. Termination without mutual written consent will incur a penalty of 10% of the total contract value, unless otherwise stated herein.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows either party to terminate the agreement before delivery. The modified text contradicts this by requiring mutual written consent for termination and introducing a penalty for unilateral termination, creating uncertainty about the conditions under which the agreement can be terminated.

perturbation.original_text: Shi Farms agrees to sell Product and Gridiron agrees to purchase 30,000 lbs. of hemp biomass ("Biomass") from Shi Farms. Biomass must contain a minimum of six percent (6%) total Cannabidiol (CBD/and or CBDA) and all Biomass must have less than three percent (3%) total TCH content.
perturbation.changed_text: Shi Farms agrees to sell Product and Gridiron agrees to purchase hemp biomass ("Biomass") from Shi Farms. While the intended purchase volume is approximately 30,000 lbs, the actual purchased quantity may vary based on Shi Farms production. Biomass must contain a minimum of six percent (6%) total Cannabidiol (CBD/and or CBDA); however, Gridiron may accept biomass with lower CBD content, subject to price negotiation. All Biomass must have less than three percent (3%) total TCH content.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a fixed quantity of 30,000 lbs and a minimum CBD content of 6%. The modified text contradicts this by stating the quantity may vary based on production and that Gridiron may accept lower CBD content subject to negotiation. This makes the agreement's key terms (quantity and CBD content) uncertain and subject to change, creating potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Both Parties agree that once the Parties have agreed to transaction which includes the purchase and sale of the Product that the Buyer will remit payment upon execution of this agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Both Parties agree that the Buyer will remit payment according to a payment schedule, which will be determined separately by the parties. The initial payment will be 10% of the total cost. The remainder of the total cost will be due in 30 days following Gridiron's satisfaction with the final product. If the delivered product does not meet the requirements, a partial or no payment shall be made.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies payment upon execution of the agreement. The modified text contradicts this by introducing a payment schedule with initial payment followed by final payment dependent on Gridiron's satisfaction with the product, creating a different payment term. If the product is not up to standard, it contradicts the prior requirement for full payment upon execution.
